ISSUE.TITLE: Adding new migration in Nop-Data makes most tests fail
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.4 Steps to reproduce the problem: Add a dummy migration to Nop.Data.Migrations namespace, such as ``` [NopMigration("2021-08-26 00:00:00")] public class DummyMigration : AutoReversingMigration { public override void Up() { } } ``` build and run tests error root cause is `Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteException : SQLite Error 6: 'database table is locked'` This is preventing us from creating any migration in Nop.Data
